dict.acceptation: 百分比，百分率；比例，部分；[数]百分法；[商]手续费；

sent.orig: Milk intake, growth rule, milk conversion, dressing percentage and neat percentage were studied in this experiment.
sent.trans: 试验研究了犊牛的喂乳量，生长发育规律，乳的转化率、屠宰率、净肉率和经济效益等内容。

sent.orig: The percentage increase of radius of a circle is 30%, find the percentage increase its area.
sent.trans: 若一圆的半径增加了30%，则此圆的面积增加了多少巴仙？

sent.orig: The figures are expressed in terms of a percentage/in percentage terms.
sent.trans: 那些数字是以百分数表示的。

sent.orig: A percentage of earnings goes to national advertising. Another percentage may go to local advertising.
sent.trans: 其收入的一部分用于全国性广告，还有一部分用于地方性广告。

sent.orig: Percentage of low analysis fertilizers is high.
sent.trans: 低浓度的肥料所占比重大。
